t: About Us - Sterling Plumbing - Kohler
s: Sterling came into the Kohler fold in 1984, providing a full line of mid-priced plumbing products that are as tough as they are beautiful. Since then, Sterling has been a brand of Kohler, a company with a world-class reputation of its own as the recognized leader in kitchen and bath design.

t: Sterling Plumbing - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Sterling Plumbing is the brand-name of a line of plumbing products manufactured by Kohler Co. The company designs and manufactures a diverse selection of product for the kitchen and bath, including faucets, toilets, sinks, whirlpool tubs, shower doors and bathroom accessories.
